divs: Sighting DetailsWhile sitting on the shore of lake michigan, just talking and observing the waves. A transparent red orb shaped object descended from the clouds slowly and began to move NW towards Chicago, IL. Within 8-10 seconds it went direclty back into the clouds, and was gone. It was very transparent, and very dim. Our sighting of the object was very clear, and it did not appear to be moving any faster than 20 mph. Also, the object was seen on the edge of what appeared to be a string of clouds. The sky was entirely clear to the NW.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Chesterton
There were no other sightings in Chesterton on or around November 12th 2003
